items.title: Agents
items.description:
- Agents can now rejoin the console using the same name after being removed from the console.
- If an Agent has Microsoft Sysmon installed it will report in the version of Sysmon to the management console.
- Agents can now manage Microsoft Sysmon configs and installed versions of the tool using the Microsoft Sysmon integration and associating them with the Sysmon Manager role under Agent Policies. NOTE: This requires a special agent that is in beta.

items.title: Detections
items.description: - Detection rules will now have the Cyber Kill Chain phases saved on the rule for additional context.

items.title: Architecture
items.description: - Reflex now supports running the API with multiple instances behind a load balancer.

items.title: General Enhancements
items.description: - The Management console will no longer kick a user out of the console if they are missing a permission, a friendly error will be supplied instead.

items.title: Event Rules
items.description: - Fixed an issue where event rules with intel match would not trigger if the source document was missing the desired field.

items.title: Event Queue
items.description: - When selecting events from different organizations back to back the UI would incorrectly indicate that events from multiple organizations were selected at the same time.

items.title: Detections
items.description: - Fixed an issue when attempting to select all detections matching the filter would cause an Internal Server error.
